description: Tactical recommendation rules that reference compendium data (effects.json, modifiers.json, advantages.json, skills.json)

tactical_rules.name: Bypass High Dodge
tactical_rules.description: Use area effects or indirect attacks to bypass Dodge defense
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Area effects don't require attack checks. Indirect allows attacks from any point.

tactical_rules.name: Bypass High Parry
tactical_rules.description: Use ranged attacks, area effects, or indirect attacks to bypass Parry
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Parry only works against close attacks. Ranged and area effects bypass it.

tactical_rules.name: Exploit Low Physical Defense
tactical_rules.description: Use high-damage attacks that target Toughness when foe has low Toughness
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Damage effects target Toughness. High DC damage is most effective against low Toughness.

tactical_rules.name: Bypass High Will
tactical_rules.description: Avoid Will-based attacks, use Fortitude, Dodge, or Toughness instead
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Afflictions can target Fortitude or Will. When Will is high, use Fortitude-based effects.

tactical_rules.name: Bypass High Fortitude
tactical_rules.description: Avoid Fortitude-based attacks, use Will, Dodge, or Toughness instead
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Afflictions can target Fortitude or Will. When Fortitude is high, use Will-based effects.

tactical_rules.name: Use Ultimate Effort for Inaccurate
tactical_rules.description: Spend hero point to negate Inaccurate flaw with Ultimate Effort advantage
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Ultimate Effort allows natural 20 on any check, bypassing penalties from flaws like Inaccurate.
tactical_rules.recommendation: Use Ultimate Effort to get natural 20, bypassing Inaccurate penalty

tactical_rules.name: Use Multiattack Against Multiple Targets
tactical_rules.description: Multiattack is most effective when hitting multiple targets or concentrating fire
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Multiattack allows hitting multiple targets or increasing effect rank on single target.

tactical_rules.name: Use Cumulative Affliction for Persistent Effects
tactical_rules.description: Cumulative Afflictions build up degrees over multiple attacks
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Cumulative Affliction adds degrees together, making it effective for persistent conditions.

tactical_rules.name: Use Penetrating Against Impervious
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Each rank of Penetrating offsets an equivalent rank of Impervious.

tactical_rules.name: Use Secondary Effect for Follow-up Damage
tactical_rules.description: Secondary Effect causes effect to occur again next round automatically
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Secondary Effect causes the effect to occur again in the following round without additional action.

tactical_rules.name: Use Reaction for Defensive Powers
tactical_rules.description: Reaction modifier allows powers to activate automatically when triggered
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Reaction changes action from standard/move to reaction, allowing automatic activation.

tactical_rules.name: Use Subtle for Hidden Attacks
tactical_rules.description: Subtle modifier makes effects less noticeable, harder to detect
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Subtle 1 requires DC 20 Perception check to detect. Subtle 2 is undetectable.

tactical_rules.name: Weaken Before Damage
tactical_rules.description: Use Weaken to reduce defense before following with Damage
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Weaken reduces a defense, making subsequent attacks more effective.

tactical_rules.name: Use Nullify Against Specific Powers
tactical_rules.description: Nullify can counter specific power descriptors
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Nullify counters effects with specific descriptors. Very effective against single-power foes.

tactical_rules.name: Choose Optimal Affliction Conditions
tactical_rules.description: Select Affliction conditions based on tactical situation
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Affliction conditions: 1st degree (dazed, hindered, impaired), 2nd degree (stunned, defenseless), 3rd degree (incapacitated, controlled).

tactical_rules.name: Use Accurate Attack Maneuver
tactical_rules.description: Trade effect rank for attack bonus using Accurate Attack advantage
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: Accurate Attack allows -5 effect modifier for +5 attack bonus, useful for high-defense targets.

tactical_rules.name: Use All-Out Attack Maneuver
tactical_rules.description: Trade defense for attack bonus using All-Out Attack advantage
tactical_rules.rulebook_reference: All-Out Attack allows -5 active defenses for +5 attack bonus, high risk/high reward.

Multiattack.best_use: multiple targets or single target with high effect

Ultimate Effort.best_use: negate Inaccurate flaw or guarantee critical hit
